Package draw.basic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoxBlur
    Blur filter sets the value of each pixel to the average value of its neighboring pixels.
    ColorPalette
    This class encodes some basic colors that are used in UIs.
    GrayScaleConverter
    A utility class for converting color images into grayscale prior to feature extraction.
    RotatedEllipse
    A basic rotated ellipse class for drawing.
    RoundGradientContext
    This class implements the paint context for round gradients.
    ScreenImage
    This is a convenience class to create and optionally save to a file a BufferedImage of an area shown on the screen.
